Dumb Mouse
==========

Card speeds
-----------

GPK4000 (SwtSpd):
   9600 (372/1), 19200 (744/4), 57600 (744/12)

Multiflex (PTS):
   9600 (372/1), 19200 (372/2), 38400 (372/4), 76800 (372/8), 156300 (372/16)

SIO speeds
----------

Windows:
   110, 300, 600, 1200, 2400, 4800, 9600, 14400, 19200, 38400, 56000, 128000,
   256000

Unix:
   50, 75, 110, 134, 150, 200, 300, 600, 1200, 1800, 2400, 4800, 9600, 19200,
   38400, 57600, 115200, 230400
